author: arp
msg: Creating a branch for HDFS-6581 (Support for writing to single replica in Memory)

author: dag
msg: DERBY-6708 OOME when running ConstraintCharacteristicsTest with smaller heap
Patch derby-6708. Reduces the number of rows of the fixture
testManySimilarDuplicates from 40K to 4K. Removes the use of
in-memory database for all fixtures that use it.  In my setup (Ubuntu
12.04 64 bits, JDK 8u20) the test now runs fine with -Xmx128M, in ca.

msg: Took out language specific info to OS. lang and version. Back to English for maintenance reasons.
